remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a uniformly continuous function from uniform space ` U ` to uniform space ` V ` ." , expressed with filter bases for the entourages.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2018.)
statement:
isucn2.u $e |- U = ( ( X X. X ) filGen R ) $.
isucn2.v $e |- V = ( ( Y X. Y ) filGen S ) $.
isucn2.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) $.
isucn2.2 $e |- ( ph -> V e. ( UnifOn ` Y ) ) $.
isucn2.3 $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( fBas ` ( X X. X ) ) ) $.
isucn2.4 $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( fBas ` ( Y X. Y ) ) ) $.
isucn2 $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( U uCn V ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. s e. S E. r e. R A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x r y -> ( F ` x ) s ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d F r s x y $.
$d R r x y $.
$d S s x y $.
$d U r s x y $.
$d V s x $.
$d X r s x y $.
$d Y s x y $.
$d ph r s x y $.
